gui.gui.dialog.title: About

errors.errors.description.INVALID_CHARACTER: This character is not allowed in the definition file.
errors.errors.description.INVALID_NAME:
The name used is either a reserved word, not a valid name for a device or invalid logic gate name.
Names must start with a letter and can only contain letters, numbers. Logic gates symbols must be in upper case.
errors.errors.description.INVALID_HEADER: Missing bracket in the header definition
errors.errors.description.MISSING_HEADER: Missing or incorrect header definition within the square brackets
errors.errors.description.MISSING_DOT: Missing dot to show connections or output of dtype
errors.errors.description.MISSING_I: Missing I before the input port number
errors.errors.description.MISSING_PORT: Missing port for either the input or output
errors.errors.description.MISSING_REQUIRED_PARA: Missing a parameter that needs to be defined
errors.errors.description.NAME_DEFINED: Name is already assigned to another gate
errors.errors.description.SYNTAX_ERROR: General syntax error, i.e check for missing brackets, semicolon etc.
errors.errors.description.INVALID_DEVICE: The device hasn't been defined in the [devices] block
errors.errors.description.INVALID_INPUTS: The inputs should be within the range 1-16 and dtype inputs should be CLK, DATA, Q, QBAR, SET, CLEAR
